--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>     He dove to the right.  His left wing tip caught on fire but he 
put it out 
> with his landing.  He tosses the tail into the inferno and fires 
four shots 
> with his left arm cannon.
